name: RE-SHOOT-ABLE
description:
FICTIONAL STORY!

You got Stuck in a Science Lab where all the Scientists turns into ZOMBIES due to failure of an Experiment and you have to find the Brain of the Head Scientist of that Experiment so the world can know, What's the reason behind this Failure? And there is limited amount of AMMO in the lab so you have to REUSE them.

CONTROLS! 

• Movement : WASD or Arrow Keys

• Look : Mouse

• Shoot : Left Mouse Button

• Reuse Bullets

CREDITS!

All asset used in this Game is SELF MADE or with Free for Personal Use license and the Respected Owners have the Copyrights of those Assets.

Here's the Websites From where the Assets are taken. ( If you want to credit any asset individually , feel free to Contact me. )

Models.

• https://assetstore.unity.com/

• https://sketchfab.com/

Sounds.

• https://assetstore.unity.com/

• https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/

Youtube audio Library.

Fonts.

• https://www.dafont.com/

JAM SUBMISSION!

This Game is made completely during the 1 week Period of GENRE MESH JAM with the Theme ( REUSABLE ) in mind.

This Game mainly consist the Genre of HORROR , SHOOTING and SURVIVAL but you can feel others genres too while Playing this Game.

FEEDBACKS!

If you Played and Completed the Game make sure to share Your Experience and leave a feedback so you will get more interesting Updates as Your Choice. Feel free to comment What you Like and Dislike during the Game and if you Played this Game during the Jam make sure to Rate it as Your Opinion . Also due to the Deadline for the Submission this Game is not Play Tested, so if you find any Bugs or Glitches feel free to contact me or leave it in the Comment Section.

ENJOY!
